sentences.sContent: The greatest amount of nuclear binding energy per nucleon occurs for nuclei in the vicinity of iron.
sentences.sContent_eng: The greatest amount of nuclear binding energy per nucleon occurs for nuclei in the vicinity of iron.
sentences.sCn: 按每个核子计，最大的核结合能量出现在铁附近的核中。

sentences.sContent: To clarify the nuclear effects of deuteron will contribute to a better understanding of parton distributions in bound nucleon.
sentences.sContent_eng: To clarify the nuclear effects of deuteron will contribute to a better understanding of parton distributions in bound nucleon.
sentences.sCn: 澄清氘核结构函数的核效应，有助于我们更好的了解束缚核子的部分子分布函数。

sentences.sContent: The structure, property and working principle of nucleon turning tray steelyard were introduced, and its working feature as well as main factors of disturbing measuring accuracy were analyzed.
sentences.sContent_eng: The structure, property and working principle of nucleon turning tray steelyard were introduced, and its working feature as well as main factors of disturbing measuring accuracy were analyzed.
sentences.sCn: 介绍了核子转盘秤的结构、性能及工作原理，分析了它的工作特征及干扰计量准确度的主要因素。

trans.tranOther: a proton or neutron, esp one present in an atomic nucleus
